whatIsTheBusinessNameTitle: What is the name of the business?
whatIsTheBusinessNamePublic: We will show the business name on the public list of authorised agents.
error-whatIsTheBusinessNameInvalidCharac: Business name must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-whatIsTheBusinessNameCharactersLim: Business name must be 200 characters or less
